name: Brother.
description:
Brother is a self-generating puzzle game.

You start with what appears to be a "recovery system".
This program will allow you to learn a bit more about what happened to a certain missing doctor.

Investigate his private life, find passwords, get access to multiple executable, and try to find out what happened.

Please note that this game does not contain a true ending in a traditional way. You can choose to end the game whenever you like. You can choose to stop thinking about the game once you get a thorough idea of what happened, or to stop when you get to the credits.

Developer, assets-designer, story maker : - Cypooos

Thanks to: - Youli, Ognion & zero (playtesters) - CCgauche (development and discovery of rust) - My family because every game maker must thank their family !

Game made by .
